post.body: I like eggs.....okay, now, I'm really going to work now. Fer reeeeeeelz.
For online procrastination. Keep it in a tab, and it will pop up when done. http://theinsomniacsociety.com/timer.html
- Arrrrgh. I know. I know. I have a little egg timer widget to make me work for 10 min, then 25, then 1 hour etc.
- I had a wee walk and it was great. Though I am bit tired it was good to get out!
So jealous! Only been back home a few weeks and trying to figure out when and how I go back to Tanzania!
- Skeeeery!
Hang on! You'll get through....
Gonna cram some learnin' in before my interview cuz I gatherz I should sound smart.
My guinea pig keeps checking the inside of his house and refusing to go in! What could be in there?
is really, stupidly, frustratingly still sick.
Cleaning the gp cage on a Saturday night. Exciting life I lead, no?
I have a little egg timer thing in my dock so that I work in little increments. Okay. I'll stop procrastinating now.
Jet-lagged still? Flu not helping!
After vacation is work. Huh. The longer the vacation, the more work one has to catch up on. Crap.
Home, in a snowstorm.
Brainstorming for my HK meeting!
Going bowling.
Going to the opening of a restaurant tonight with cuisine called, "x-treme chinese." I dunno.
Thinks this instant coffee mix probably has melamine in it and she should probably not drink it.
How can I have more mozzie bites from Hong Kong than Tanzania?
